channel.title: Can someone make me a very simple burier
channel.description:
OK, all i need is a script that i can run when i have a full inventory of bones that will bury them all, you might ask why i don't use 'bone picker and burier' scripts but i have tried many and none of them seem to work for me. Also, i normally like to kill guards and pick up the bones as i go to get my combat levels up aswell.
I know this is a very simple script but i don't understand scripting and i don't have a hope in hell of writing my own, so i would really appreciate it if someone would make one for me. :D

item.title: Can someone make me a very simple burier
item.dc:creator: @eggi4792 eggi4792
item.description:
@eggi4792 wrote:

I can’t seem to find that folder, but, i have now learnt how to write scripts (it’s easier than i first thought) so i am working on my own bone burier, i have already created a script that logs you right in from the runescape.com main menu (i know it’s simple, but i’m proud of it)

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone make me a very simple burier

item.title: Can someone make me a very simple burier
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

If its just for burying bones, edit the DropAll procedure in the SRL folder to drop the items instead, that would probably work.

But whats better is to make a DTM of the bones and tell it to clic kthe DTM and wait, not that confusing heh. Or just copy and paste a pre-made DTM of a boen from a different script.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone make me a very simple burier
item.dc:creator: @eggi4792 eggi4792
item.description:
@eggi4792 wrote:

Rune Hacker:

Best thing to do is for you to learn scripting and make it yourself :P. But im too busy, amd im pretty sure ive seen them around, idk

oh trust me, i have tried to learn scripting and i have read every tutorial under the sun but i always get completely and utterly confused and i never get anything right
